pkgmetadata.longdescription: ========================Core Explore Example App========================Exploration by example for the curator core project.Quick start===========1. Add "core_explore_example_app" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting----------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python INSTALLED_APPS = [ ... 'core_explore_example_app', ]2. Include the core_explore_example_app URLconf in your project urls.py-----------------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python url(r'^explore/example/', include('core_explore_example_app.urls')),
